entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Embedded version of NuGet client does not respect "no_proxy" configuration #22942
  • Access to the path is denied - MacOS 11 - Net6.0 #22929
  • msbuild publish fails for runtime target win-x86 #22928
  • dotnet CLI version selector #22925
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #sdk-120042-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #22924

Closed

  • dotnet run option '--no-dependencies' is passed on as argument to application #22545

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove AoT `Publish Test Results` Step #22946
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unskip Blazor Integration Tests #22945
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1501392 #22943
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.102 #22940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1500846 #22935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle the case when procfs is inaccessible #22927
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.405 #22939
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.417 #22937
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.211 #22938
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 (6.0.1xx) #22941
  • Exclude runtimeidentifiers for runtimepack #22658
    Area-Workloads
  • Transformed --arch switch to --platform for dll tests container scenario #22912
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Update developer-guide to instruct to source the dogfood bash script #22700
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge 6.0.1xx into the 6.0.2xx branch to catch it up to current #22861
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve error message for path mismatch #22919
    Area-Infrastructure
  • upgrade ubuntu version #22879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22917
    Area-Infrastructure
  • include props and targets for code style packages #22918
    Area-Infrastructure
